content: Emacs doesn't show the dagger on purpose, it will instead indicate the dagger by displaying the variable as grey as opposed to blue if it was shadowed or not at all like this: : typ if it was pattern matched on in a way that is not accessible
Oh wow, you're right, if I look at it very carefully it's highlighted differently. It's just barely visible in my color scheme :see_no_evil:
Andrés Goens has marked this topic as resolved.
